unnormalised: Arey yaar, that cart abandonment stings more than a Delhi summer in June! Did my credit card get rejected again? Maybe Lakshmi, the Goddess of prosperity, needs a bigger puja at 09:00 hrs on 26/01/2024!
normalised: Arey yaar, that cart abandonment stings more than a Delhi summer in June! Did my credit card get rejected again? Maybe Lakshmi, the Goddess of prosperity, needs a bigger puja at nine o'clock on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four!

unnormalised: Come back, please! I promise to finally use that Rs. 500 discount code from Diwali '22! Don't leave me hanging like IIM-A placement day on 15/08/2023.
normalised: Come back, please! I promise to finally use that rupee five hundred discount code from Diwali two thousand and twenty two! Don't leave me hanging like I I M A placement day on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty three.

unnormalised: Think of the poor delivery guy, Raju!
normalised: Think of the poor delivery guy, Raju!
